synopsis.text:
Takaaki's life takes an interesting turn with the arrival of Silfa, an android maid who is eager to please but struggles with her public duties due to her shy nature. However, when it comes to preparing Yuzuhara Haruka's signature curry for Takaaki, Silfa is willing to face her fears and even engage in a culinary competition with Milfa (Harumi).

As the summer season sets in, the atmosphere at school becomes electric with the announcement of a special swimsuit fashion show. Maaryan, with the principal's approval, is determined to make this event unforgettable. Despite Kousaka Tamaki's initial reluctance, she, along with Yuzuhara Konomi and even the surprised Kusugawa Sasara, decide to participate when Milfa joins the event to impress her beloved, Takaaki.

In this vibrant world, every day brings new challenges and adventures for Takaaki and his friends. From culinary competitions to swimsuit fashion shows, the group finds themselves in the thick of exciting events, each vying for Takaaki's attention in their unique ways. The ToHeart2 universe promises a rollercoaster ride of emotions, laughter, and fun.
